select bookId, bookName, b.authorName, a.authorId, c.cateName, a.cateCode, publisher, publeYear, bookPrice, bookDiscount from psh_book a left outer join psh_author b on a.authorId = b.authorId left outer join psh_bcate c on a.cateCode = c.cateCode
order by bookId desc limit #{skip}, #{amount}
select authorid from psh_author where authorname like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select * from psh_bcate where cateCode > 100000 and cateCode < 200000
select * from psh_bcate where cateCode > 200000 and cateCode < 300000

select a.BOOKID, a.BOOKNAME, a.AUTHORID, b.AUTHORNAME, a.PUBLEYEAR, a.PUBLISHER, a.CATECODE, c.CATENAME, a.BOOKPRICE, a.BOOKSTOCK, a.BOOKDISCOUNT, a.BOOKINTRO, a.BOOKCONTENTS from psh_book a left outer join psh_author b on a.authorId = b.authorId left outer join psh_bcate c on a.catecode = c.catecode where bookid = ${bookId}
select bookId, bookName from psh_book where bookId = #{bookId}
select bookId, bookName, ratingAvg, (select cateName from psh_bcate where psh_book.cateCode = psh_bcate.cateCode) as cateName from psh_book order by ratingAvg desc limit 8
